item.title: Things to do in London in October 2022
item.description: October has arrived and London is back, and there are heaps of great events on. With Halloween events back in full swing, Black History Month and some of the best in arts and culture including Southbank’s London Literature Festival and Frieze London, it’s shaping up to be a big one! Here are some of our favourite things you can do in the city this October. Affordable Art Fair Battersea Autumn When: 20 – 23 October 2022
